! Large Cocoon: Through the thin membrane can be seen as a fairy mutates. It looks like a cocoon can break by hitting it. And you can pour in Mica and thus boost the mutation. (Use Mica , select Cocoon and click on Mica. If you want to break the cocoon, hit it, hold down "Ctrl". To improve the efficiency of shock, use attack skills.) [npc_%objectId%_1|Normal Attack] [npc_%objectId%_2|Powerful Attack]
